message.content:
1. What specific evidence supports the claim that the original Broadway production of "Fiddler on the Roof" surpassed 3,000 performances, making it the first musical theatre run in history to do so?
2. Can you provide the exact year when the Broadway musical "Fiddler on the Roof" opened in 1964 and when "Grease" surpassed its run to become the longest-running Broadway musical?
3. How were the profitability and acclaim of the original production of "Fiddler on the Roof" quantified or documented during its Broadway run?
4. What were the specific years of the five Broadway revivals of "Fiddler on the Roof" and the release of the 1971 film adaptation mentioned in the claim?
